title: Exfo: Fiscal 2Q Earnings Snapshot
maintext:
QUEBEC CITY (AP) _ Exfo Inc. (EXFO) on Tuesday reported a fiscal second-quarter loss of $9 million, after reporting a profit in the same period a year earlier.
The Quebec City-based company said it had a loss of 16 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for amortization costs and non-recurring costs, came to 12 cents per share.
The telecommunications testing company posted revenue of $55.3 million in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, the companyâ€™s shares hit $2.91. A year ago, they were trading at $4.10.
